channel.title: CVE Feed for JetBrains -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for JetBrains -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-38063|2024-10-23T14:37:18.530Z -- jetbrains -- teamcity
item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2023.05.1 stored XSS while running custom builds was possible

item.title: CVE-2023-39261|2024-10-23T15:40:10.411Z -- jetbrains -- intellij%20idea
item.description: In JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA before 2023.2 plugin for Space was requesting excessive permissions

item.title: CVE-2023-38062|2024-10-23T14:40:05.492Z -- jetbrains -- teamcity
item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2023.05.1 parameters of the "password" type could be shown in the UI in certain composite build configurations

item.title: CVE-2023-38061|2024-10-23T14:40:18.471Z -- jetbrains -- teamcity
item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2023.05.1 stored XSS when using a custom theme was possible

item.title: CVE-2024-49579|2024-10-17T14:00:40.770Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.3.47197 insecure plugin iframe allowed arbitrary JavaScript execution and unauthorized API requests

item.title: CVE-2024-49580|2024-10-17T13:00:16.342Z -- jetbrains -- ktor
item.description: In JetBrains Ktor before 3.0.0 improper caching in HttpCache Plugin could lead to response information disclosure

item.title: CVE-2024-49579|2024-10-17T13:00:15.587Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.3.47197 insecure plugin iframe allowed arbitrary JavaScript execution and unauthorized API requests

item.title: CVE-2024-48902|2024-10-10T13:44:30.364Z -- jetbrains -- youtrack
item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.3.46677 improper access control allowed users with project update permission to delete applications via API

item.title: CVE-2024-47949|2024-10-08T16:13:37.972Z -- jetbrains -- teamcity
item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2024.07.3 path traversal allowed backup file write to arbitrary location

item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2024.07.3 password could be exposed via Sonar runner REST API

item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2024.07.3 path traversal leading to information disclosure was possible via server backups

item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2024.07.3 stored XSS was possible in Backup configuration settings

item.description: In JetBrains TeamCity before 2024.07.3 stored XSS was possible via server global settings

item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.3.44799 access to global app config data without appropriate permissions was possible

item.description: In JetBrains YouTrack before 2024.3.44799 token could be revealed on Imports page
